_PAGE_FILTER_BOOLEAN_ARGUMENTS_FALSE_VAL: The translated text to be returned in case the value is False
_PAGE_FILTER_BOOLEAN_ARGUMENTS_TRUE_VALU: The translated text to be returned in case the value is True
_PAGE_FILTER_BOOLEAN_ARGUMENTS_USE_NIL_: Indicates whether an empty string should be returned for undefined or null
_PAGE_FILTER_BOOLEAN_ARGUMENTS_VALUE_: The value to be converted into translated text
_PAGE_FILTER_BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterBoolean is used to convert a boolean value into translated text. It allows customization of the texts for True and False values and the option to return an empty string for undefined or null.
